```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)


library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(readxl)

load("/data/nycdoe/clean_data/midDBN_hs_zone_eighth_grade_placement.Rdata")
load("/data/nycdoe/clean_data/join_zone_bio.Rdata")

placementData <- midDbn_hs_zone_data

join_zone_bio

placed <- join_zone_bio %>% filter(schools == "mid") %>% select(student_id_scram, year, zoned_hs_dbn)

#%>% gather("schooltype","dbn", em, hs, mid) %>% filter(!is.na(dbn)) %>% select(-year)

nrow(placed_data)

placed_data <- placed %>% spread(schooltype, dbn)

placed_data %>% filter(!is.na(em) & !is.na(mid) & !is.na(hs))%>% group_by(student_id_scram) %>% summarise(count = n())


```

See count of students in each middle school DBN
```{r}
placementData %>% group_by(mid) %>% summarise(count = n())
```
